description:
8th Squad vice captain Ginger Bread, known as the Magician`s Doll, seems to know about the secret of the Arcobaleno. Lal Mirch is weakened by his box weapon attack, Ragno Ciel Sereno. Seeing this, Ginger Bread happily begins to talk about Colonnello`s end… Upon hearing that, Lal Mirch begins to remember things—the fateful day when the Arcobaleno were born.
Source: crunchyroll
